articles.title: Vaccinated American Tourists May Soon Travel to Europe - The New York Times
articles.description: The head of the European Commission said the bloc would switch policy, under certain conditions, after more than a year of mostly banning nonessential travel.
articles.content: BRUSSELS American tourists who have been fully vaccinated against Covid-19 will be able to visit the European Union over the summer, the head of the blocs executive body said in an interview with The… [+1121 chars]

articles.title: 'The clubs cannot leave' - Real Madrid president insists Super League will return - The Star Online
